heloc.title: HELOC (Home Equity Line of Credit)
heloc.description: A revolving credit line secured by your home's equity. Functions like a credit card but with lower interest rates.
heloc.limitDetail: Up to 80-90% of home value minus existing mortgage
heloc.usageDetail: Debt consolidation, home improvements, emergency funds

dti.title: DTI (Debt-to-Income Ratio)
dti.description: The percentage of your monthly income that goes toward debt payments. A key metric lenders use.
dti.formulaDetail: (Total Monthly Debt Payments / Gross Monthly Income) Ã— 100

personal.title: Personal Loan
personal.description: Unsecured installment loan with fixed monthly payments. Common for debt consolidation.

transfer.title: Balance Transfer
transfer.description: Moving high-interest debt to a credit card with lower promotional rates.

heloc.description: Default rate for Home Equity Line of Credit calculations.
